sentences.en: A modified serial decoding algorithm for low - density parity - check ( LDPC ) codes is proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种改进的 低密度 奇偶校验码 ( LDPC ) 串行译码算法.

sentences.en: A wavelet - domain digital watermarking scheme based on parity - decomposition is proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种基于奇偶分解的小波域图像数字水印方案.

sentences.en: Frequent drops in the dollar parity have repeatedly touched off gold rushes.
sentences.cn: 美元比价不断下跌,触发了一次又一次新的抢购黄金的风潮.

sentences.en: If the law of parity conservation were suspended, this restriction would be removed.
sentences.cn: 如果宇称守恒定律受到破坏, 就会取消这个限制.

sentences.en: Italy wanted naval parity with France.
sentences.cn: 意大利想要在海军实力上与法国平起平坐。

sentences.en: Parity is often used to check the integrity of transmitted data.
sentences.cn: 奇偶校验用于检验数据的完整性.

sentences.en: Prison officers are demanding pay parity with the police force.
sentences.cn: 狱警正要求与警察同工同酬。

sentences.en: Purchasing power parity was developed by Swedish economist Karl Cassel.
sentences.cn: 购买力平价是由瑞典经济学家卡尔.卡瑟尔所研究提出.

sentences.en: Silver can be raised by law to a parity with gold in value.
sentences.cn: 银可由法律提高到和金同等的价值.

sentences.en: The parity of atomic states is important in spectroscopy.
sentences.cn: 原子状态的宇称性质在光谱中是重要的.

sentences.en: The rest of the analysis is concerned with finding the parity as well as the spin.
sentences.cn: 余下的分析不仅涉及到求自旋,而且还要求出宇称.

sentences.en: The two currencies have now reached parity.
sentences.cn: 这两种货币现已达到同等价值.

sentences.en: There is one argument for parity prices before we the subject.
sentences.cn: 最后,我们来讨论主张等位价格的另一类论调.

sentences.en: To achieve parity for agricultural prices, the Act of 1938 provided a number of devices.
sentences.cn: 为了取得农产品平价, 1938年立法提供了一些办法.

sentences.en: Women have yet to achieve wage or occupational parity in many fields.
sentences.cn: 女性在很多领域还没能争取到薪金、职位方面的平等。

phrases.tran_cn: [计]校验位（加进磁带等上的数组中以造成奇偶性的位）

trans.tran_cn: 平价，价值对等，同等，平等
trans.tran_en: the state of being equal, especially having equal pay, rights, or power
